text: Kanchi Kalyanasundaram (August 26, 1909 – May 3, 1982) is an Indian politician from the Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam. He served as a member of the Rajya Sabha from September 23, 1969 to April 2, 1970 and April 3, 1970 to April 2, 1976. == Family == Kalyanasundaram was born on August 26, 1909 to Kathirvelu. He married Valliammal. == References == * Category:1909 births Category:1982 deaths
title: K. Kalyanasundaram
